title: Logistics Stocks Sink as AI Fear Trade Finds Latest Victim
description: Logistics stocks sank Thursday as investors rushed to exit the group amid fears over disruption from artificial intelligence, making it the latest casualty of the “AI scare trade.”
content:

description: Montgomery County Public Schools will be testing a new artificial intelligence weapons detection system pilot program at three schools starting in March, which was already planned before Monday’s shooting at Wootton High School in Rockville on Monday.

description: By convening senior government leaders, investors, and enterprise decision-makers in Riyadh, Incorpify AI reinforces its position as a trusted AI partner for regulated markets. title: How AI is rewriting 70 years of lending rules
description: Artificial intelligence provides the clearest path toward a fair and accurate credit ecosystem.
content: For most of modern finance, one number has quietly dictated who gets ahead and who gets left out: the credit score. It was a breakthrough when it arrived in the 1950s, becoming an elegant shortcut for a complex decision. But shortcuts age. And in a w... [5285 chars]

title: World Radio Day 2026: Pune event reflects on radio’s future in age of AI
description: The event was organised in line with UNESCO’s theme for the year — Radio and Artificial Intelligence (AI).

title: Meta begins construction of $10 billion Indiana data center to boost AI capabilities
